C I M P 

C

cs1302.game - package cs1302.game
 

I

isLost() - Method in class cs1302.game.MinesweeperGame
Returns boolean value based on if the player has revealed a mine, which decides if the game is lost or not.
isWon() - Method in class cs1302.game.MinesweeperGame
Returns boolean value based on if the player has met the following conditions, which represent whether the game is won or not: (1) All squares containing a mine are marked as definitely containing a mine; and (2) All squares not containing a mine are revealed.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class cs1302.game.MinesweeperDriver
 
MinesweeperDriver - Class in cs1302.game
The MinesweeperDriver class creates an instance of the MinesweeperGame class, and plays the Minesweeper Alpha game.
MinesweeperDriver() - Constructor for class cs1302.game.MinesweeperDriver
 
MinesweeperGame - Class in cs1302.game
This class represents a game of Minesweeper Alpha.
MinesweeperGame(String) - Constructor for class cs1302.game.MinesweeperGame
Constructs a MinesweeperGame object with configurations from a seed file.

P

play() - Method in class cs1302.game.MinesweeperGame
Provides and runs the main game loop by invoking the printWelcome(), printMineField(), isWon(), and promptUser() methods.
printLoss() - Method in class cs1302.game.MinesweeperGame
Prints the loss message to standard output.
printMineField() - Method in class cs1302.game.MinesweeperGame
Prints the current contents of the mine field/grid to standard output.
printWelcome() - Method in class cs1302.game.MinesweeperGame
Prints a welcome message banner to standard output.
printWin() - Method in class cs1302.game.MinesweeperGame
Prints the win message to standard output, which includes the player's final score.
promptUser() - Method in class cs1302.game.MinesweeperGame
Prints the game prompt to standard output and interprets user input/commands, such as reveal, mark, guess, nofog, guess, help, and quit.
